wikispeech-desc: A text-to-speech tool to make Wikimedia's projects more accessible for people that for different reasons have difficulties reading.
prefs-wikispeech-part-of-content: Read extra information for certain elements
prefs-help-wikispeech-part-of-content: If enabled extra infromation will be read for elements like links. When this is enabled word highlighting is disabled.
wikispeech-notice-prefs-apply-on-next-pa: Changes to preferences will take effect next time a page is loaded. To listen to the current page with the new preferences, reload the page after saving.
right-wikispeech-edit-lexicon-raw: Edit Wikispeech's lexicon as raw text
action-wikispeech-edit-lexicon-raw: edit Wikispeech's lexicon as raw text
wikispeech-error-loading-audio-message: This can be caused by bad internet connection or an error on the server. Do you want to retry or stop playback?
wikispeech-lexicon-copyrightnote: By saving changes, you agree to release your contribution under the [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ CC0].
wikispeech-lexicon-null-edit: No relevant changes detected in transcription or preferred status.
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-no-item-found: No lexicon entry found with ID '$1'. Please check the ID and try again.
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-transcription-un: Could not get pronunciation from the pronunciation service
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-speechoid-down: The pronunciation service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
wikispeech-lexicon-sync-error: The lexicons are out of sync. Either they contain different properties, or some entry may only exist in one of the lexicons. Would you like to overwrite the local entry to match Speechoid?
wikispeech-lexicon-sync-error-unidentifi: An unidentified error occured when trying to sync lexicon entries.
